LanguageData.MLRP_NothingToCure_NoRimPonk: {0} is not suffering from any poison joke addiction.
LanguageData.MLRP_NothingToCure_RimPonk: {0} is not suffering from any poison joke or magical cake addictions.
LanguageData.MLRP_AntiBronyHasPlushie: A pawn with the anti brony trait has a pony plushie equipped, causing a mood penalty.
LanguageData.MLRP_AntiBronyHasHarmonyChip: You have installed a harmony chip in a pawn with the anti brony trait. This will cause a -10 penalty to their mood until it is removed.
